CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec
M and C talk in rather low voices

u.a: M hands the tray to C
M touches dishes as she talks
M offerss lid to pot C just picked up; C accepts and puts on pot
C reaches for something near M; M hands her plates
C sets out plates; C picks up silverware
C drops a utensil; picks it up
C is holding other utensils in her hand
M sets out two large plates
C picks up teapot and pours into a cup
C seems to be looking for M's cup
C sees another cup and pours
M picks up a container; spoons from it into her cup
M pours from pitcher into her cup; stirs her cup
C pours form pitcher in her cup; mumbles to herself
C spoons sugar in her cup
M puts top on sugar container; moves it away
M points in book she's holding
M turns page and points to a picture
book is finished; M closes the book
M begins turning pages of another book
C closes book; picks up one they already looked at
C closes her book; takes M's book; tosses other book away from herself; opens new book
Care_Bear feelings book is being used
